trans-unit.source: Provides the base class for elements of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.

The .NET Framework supplies two specialized classes that derive from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement>: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>, which represents individual elements, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>, which represents a series of grouped subelements.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement"></xref> class.
This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView%2A> property to `null`.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control associated with this element.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control that contains this element.
The default is `null`.
Called when the element is associated with a different <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentDoubleClick"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Gets the user interface (UI) state of the element.
The states specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates> values are enforced by the UI but may be programmatically overruled.
A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values representing the state.
